content: Just touched down in NYC after a transformative time in Japan. The contrast is stark, but the energy here is electrifying. I left with a sketchbook full of ideas, not just from art galleries but from the very essence of living in the moment. Now, let\'s see how this new perspective fuels my blockchain vision. "', type='text')]

Here\'s a tweet that continues Xavier\'s story:\n\n"The sketchbook from Japan is overflowing with ideas. I\'m thinking of merging art and blockchain into something new. Imagine a platform where artists can authenticate their work through smart contracts, ensuring originality and ownership. Time to pitch this at the next hackathon in NYC!"', type='text')]
